nodes.text: Keb Nevrunn was a male pilot who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. He flew the light cruiser Lunatic Fringer, and was a friend of the Rodian Renna for many years.

In c. 31 BBY, Nevrunn was hired by Renna to transport the Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents who were on a mission for Renna's Transport Service, aboard the Lunatic Fringer. However, while the they were returning from the mission, the ship became caught in the Cularin system asteroid belt due to the actions of a shadow creature, which was draining passing starships of power.

Nevrunn was bitter, surly and wise-cracking, and while he had a critical eye, he also had a heart of gold. He wasn't very good at remembering names, but made a special effort to remember the names of attractive female Humans and Near-Humans.

The Keb Nevrunn appears in the Living Force adventure Philosophy, and is assigned to transport the players—who role-play as the Heroes of Cularin—if the player characters do not own a starship of their own and do not have the skills to fly one.
